snippet: San Franciscans will vote on a measure that could lead to the draining and restoration of Hetch Hetchy Valley, and force the city to look elsewhere for most of its water.
abstract: San Franciscans will vote on measure that could lead to the draining and restoration of Hetch Hetchy Valley, Yosemite National Park reservoir that provides the city with most of its water; supporters of measure say San Francisco can find other sources of water, but many residents remain opposed, citing possibility of increased water rates.
lead_paragraph: San Franciscans will vote on a measure that could lead to the draining and restoration of Hetch Hetchy Valley, and force the city to look elsewhere for most of its water.

headline.seo: Hetch Valley Measure Pits Bay Area Against Environmentalists
headline.main: Putting Bay Area’s Water Source to a Vote
headline.print_headline: Putting Bay Area’s Water Source to a Vote
